## ğŸƒ Hacktoberfest 2025

Welcome to OpsaAI's Hacktoberfest contribution! We're excited to have you contribute to our AI-powered cloud infrastructure platform.

## ğŸ¯ Contribution Type

- [ ] **Bug Fix** - Fix an existing issue
- [ ] **Feature** - Add a new feature
- [ ] **Documentation** - Improve documentation
- [ ] **UI/UX** - Enhance user interface
- [ ] **Testing** - Add or improve tests
- [ ] **Performance** - Optimize performance
- [ ] **Security** - Improve security

## ğŸ“‹ Description

Describe what you'd like to contribute or work on.

## ğŸš€ Getting Started

1. **Fork the repository**
2. **Read our [Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md)**
3. **Check our [Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)**
4. **Look for issues labeled `hacktoberfest` or `good first issue`**
5. **Create a Pull Request**

## ğŸ› ï¸ Development Setup

```bash
# Clone your fork
git clone https://github.com/OpsaAI/OpsaAI.git
cd OpsaAI

# Install dependencies
pnpm install

# Start development services
./scripts/setup-services.sh

# Start the development server
pnpm dev
```
